translations: n.[计]数字；手指；[解剖]足趾（digit 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Many people inadvertently transpose digits of the ZIP code.
sentences.translation: 许多人粗心地把邮政编码的数字弄颠倒了。

sentences.sentence: Using a Magic Marker, he wrote seven digits on the poster-size banner.
sentences.translation: 他用白板笔在海报大小的横幅上写了七个数字。

sentences.sentence: By 2008, the figure had fallen into the single digits.
sentences.translation: 到2008年，这一数字已降至个位数。
